name: fxos-web-server

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/http-server.js --outfile dist/fxos-web-server.js --standalone HTTPServer && mkdir -p example/simple/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-web-server.js example/simple/lib/fxos-web-server.js && mkdir -p example/p2p/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-web-server.js example/p2p/lib/fxos-web-server.js && mkdir -p example/directory/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-web-server.js example/directory/lib/fxos-web-server.js && mkdir -p example/upload/lib && cp -rf dist/fxos-web-server.js example/upload/lib/fxos-web-server.js

description: > A basic HTTP server for Firefox OS, written in JavaScript!
